MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 16-APR-2021 16:40.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the PA7 postcode area of Bishopton. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:40pm to allow our team to locate and repair a fault on our overhead line network near High Hatton Cottage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:30pm on Friday, 16 April 2021
